name: Sonic Manifest Edition
description:
Every Deaths Of Sonic The Hedgehog, And Now Sky From Friday Night Funkin,

It Was All Marcos Black World And Grumpy Truck (Alan)'s Fault,

So I Take These Dead Bodies To The EXE Factory To Place It, And He Put Some For A Hedgehog A Black Boots, Sky's Pupils, & Aqua Fur Color, So They Activate The Lever To Make It Creation And Become The New One Is Called: Skynic
